import "../assets/scss/_skyz-demo.scss"; // import personImge from "../assets/imgs/person.jpg"; import { useState } from "react"; // import Table from "./Table"; import Kanban from "./Kanban"; const Demo = () => { // Create an array of booleans to manage the open state of each box const [boxOpenStates, setBoxOpenStates] = useState({ connections: false, communication: false, // Add more keys for other boxes here }); const [openBox, setOpenBox] = useState(null); // Track the currently open box const openBoxHandler = (boxKey) => { setOpenBox(boxKey); }; const [sidebarOpen, setSidebarOpen] = useState(false); const handleToggleSidebarDemo = () => { setSidebarOpen(!sidebarOpen); }; const [kanbansData, setKanbansData] = useState({ kanban1: { open: [ { id: "task-kanban1-1", title: "Task 1 (kanban1)", description: "Description for Task 1", assignedTo: "User A", }, // ... other tasks ], ongoing: [ { id: "task-kanban1-2", title: "Task 2 (kanban1)", description: "Description for Task 2", assignedTo: "User B", }, // ... other tasks ], close: [ { id: "task-kanban1-3", title: "Task 3 (kanban1)", description: "Description for Task 3", assignedTo: "User C", }, // ... other tasks ], }, kanban2: { open: [ { id: "task-kanban2-1", title: "Task 1 (kanban2)", description: "Description for Task 1", assignedTo: "User A", }, // ... other tasks ], ongoing: [ { id: "task-kanban2-2", title: "Task 2 (kanban2)", description: "Description for Task 2", assignedTo: "User B", }, // ... other tasks ], close: [ { id: "task-kanban2-3", title: "Task 3 (kanban2)", description: "Description for Task 3", assignedTo: "User C", }, // ... other tasks ], }, kanban3: { open: [ { id: "task-kanban3-1", title: "Task 1 (kanban3)", description: "Description for Task 1", assignedTo: "User A", }, // ... other tasks ], ongoing: [ { id: "task-kanban3-2", title: "Task 2 (kanban3)", description: "Description for Task 2", assignedTo: "User B", }, // ... other tasks ], close: [ { id: "task-kanban3-3", title: "Task 3 (kanban3)", description: "Description for Task 3", assignedTo: "User C", }, // ... other tasks ], }, }); const onDragEnd = (result) => { const { destination, source, draggableId } = result; // If there's no destination or the task was dropped back into its original position, do nothing if ( !destination || (destination.droppableId === source.droppableId && destination.index === source.index) ) { return; } // Get the task list for the source and destination columns const sourceTasks = [ ...kanbansData[source.droppableId][source.droppableId], ]; const destinationTasks = [ ...kanbansData[destination.droppableId][destination.droppableId], ]; // Find the task being dragged const draggedTask = sourceTasks.find((task) => task.id === draggableId); if (!draggedTask) { console.error(`Task with id ${draggableId} not found in source column.`); return; } // If the destination column is different from the source column if (destination.droppableId !== source.droppableId) { // Remove the task from the source column sourceTasks.splice(source.index, 1); // Insert the task into the destination column at the specified index destinationTasks.splice(destination.index, 0, draggedTask); // Update the state with the new task order setKanbansData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [source.droppableId]: { ...prevData[source.droppableId], [source.droppableId]: sourceTasks, }, [destination.droppableId]: { ...prevData[destination.droppableId], [destination.droppableId]: destinationTasks, }, })); } else { // If the destination column is the same as the source column, reordering within the same column sourceTasks.splice(source.index, 1); sourceTasks.splice(destination.index, 0, draggedTask); // Update the state with the new task order within the same column setKanbansData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [source.droppableId]: { ...prevData[source.droppableId], [source.droppableId]: sourceTasks, }, })); } }; return (
{/*

); }; export default Demo;
